history.narrative: Law 6-142 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 6-427, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 10, 1986 and June 24, 1986, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 8, 1986, it was assigned Act No. 6-184 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
